  physical_appearance: The image shows a black-and-white photograph. It is rectangular and it features military personnel on the balcony
 steps
 and outside of a building that has colonnades. Everyone in the photograph is standing. There are two rows of military personnel standing at attention and facing the steps of the building. A military personnel dressed in white is standing on the steps with a podium that is covered with the flag of the Union Jack. He seems to be the centre of attention as military personnel from the ground
 the steps
 and the balcony are all facing in his direction.

metadata.title_text: Admiral Mountbatten reading the order of the day after the Japanese surrender Photography Album (donation from Anthony Robert Saint Claire)
metadata.physical_appearance: The image shows a black-and-white photograph. It is rectangular and it features military personnel on the balcony, steps, and outside of a building that has colonnades. Everyone in the photograph is standing. There are two rows of military personnel standing at attention and facing the steps of the building. A military personnel dressed in white is standing on the steps with a podium that is covered with the flag of the Union Jack. He seems to be the centre of attention as military personnel from the ground, the steps, and the balcony are all facing in his direction.
